titles.title: Guard and Reserve Hazard Duty Pay Equity Act
Guard and Reserve Hazard Duty Pay Equity Act
A bill to amend title 37, United States Code, to standardize payment of hazardous duty incentive pay for members of the reserve components of the Armed Forces, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary:
Guard and Reserve Hazard Duty Pay Equity Act
This bill provides hazardous duty incentive pay to members of an Armed Forces reserve component or the National Guard who perform a parachute jump as an essential part of their military duty. Currently, only active duty members are entitled to hazardous duty incentive pay for performing such duties.
